item.title: Exploring Tools For Managing Your Dotfiles
item.description: It’s been almost 2 years since I installed Arch on my laptop, and I feel like my dotfiles are becoming more and more disorganized. I still have configuration files from programs I no longer use, and keeping track of how I customize the ones I do use is taking far more effort than it should. To address this, I’ve decided to put my dotfiles under version control, so I can have a clearer view of how they change over time.
